name: Anthony D. RE and Mary C. Re, Respondents, v. COLUMBIA ACCIDENT & HEALTH INSURANCE COMPANY, Petitioner
name_abbreviation: Re v. Columbia Accident & Health Insurance

parties: Anthony D. RE and Mary C. Re, Respondents, v. COLUMBIA ACCIDENT & HEALTH INSURANCE COMPANY, Petitioner.

opinions.text:
ORDER
PER CURIAM.
AND NOW, to-wit, this 16th day of May, 1985, it appearing from the record that the Petitioner’s exceptions were preserved for review, it is hereby ORDERED, ADJUDGED and DECREED that the Order of the Superior Court dated August 31, 1984 is reversed, and this case is remanded to the Superior Court for disposition of Petitioner’s exceptions to the trial judge’s jury instructions.
opinions.author: PER CURIAM.

casebody.head_matter:
492 A.2d 1381
Anthony D. RE and Mary C. Re, Respondents, v. COLUMBIA ACCIDENT & HEALTH INSURANCE COMPANY, Petitioner.
Supreme Court of Pennsylvania, Eastern District.
May 16, 1985.
